description: This file is a shell script used for configuring and managing GRE tunnels and associated network interfaces, bridges, and system parameters for a hotspot device.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events for snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial configuration parameters from the PSM database.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates and configures GRE tunnel interfaces and bridge configurations.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Sets up system events for keep-alive functionality.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Updates iptables rules for network traffic forwarding.
